segments.text: Hello , I hope to get a room for the night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see if I can fit you in . What kind of room do you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I only need a single room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are in luck , we have one free .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am very grateful . How much will it be ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will be 600 RIB . Could I have your credit card please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh dear . I don't have it with me . Do you take debit cards or should I pay with cash ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A debit card will be fine .
segments.speaker: S2
